input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

ref_genomes_list.description: Path to TSV list of reference genomes to download, first column is the name of the genome and second column is the accession.

ref_genomes_dir.description: Path to directory of pre-downloaded reference genomes in FASTA format and ending in .fna

accessions_list.description: Path to TSV list of SRA fastq accessions to download, first column is the sample name and second column is the accession. Provide this if you did not pre-download FASTQ samples.

fastq_dir.description: Path to directory of pre-downloaded FASTQ files, provide this if you already downloaded all sample accessions.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.
